summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3338, for the improvement of the alley between blocks 11 and 12, Crown Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue West and 9th Avenue West, from West Galer Street to West Garfield Street, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41234 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
